name: Lezyne Strip Drive Light
description: If you like modes, this is your tail-light. The Strip Drive light has 11 different settings from an economy flash to an eye-catching daytime pop of lights. 5 powerful red LEDs and a custom engineered reflector add over 270° of visibility. The tool-free mount fits round seat posts or aero posts, so you can swap it between your trusty commuter and your race bike.11 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 8 in flashing; steady: 45 lumens (2.25h), 15 lumens (7h), 3 lumens (30h), flash 1–25 lumens (8h), flash 2–15 lumens (8h), flash 3–15 lumens (8.3h), flash 4–20 lumens (10h), flash 5–5 lumens (29h), flash 6–3 lumens (57h), day flash 1–150 lumens (6.5h) and day flash 2–100 lumens (7h).Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes.Wide-angle lens that provides over 270° of visibility.Aero post compatible mount.Easy USB charging via micro-USB takes only about 2 hours.LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go.Silicone, tool-free mounting straps.IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours.
